module.name: composition_of_individual_activity
module.keywords: module, composition, whole-part, individual, activity, process plant

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record a whole-part relationship between individual activities.
The nature of a whole-part relationship between individual activities may be specified by indicating a class of composition of activity of which it is a member.

example.p: The relationship 'start up for daily operation on 2001-10-22' between:

ul.li: the individual activity 'Much Binding B operation on 2001-10-22'; and
the individual activity 'Much Binding B daily start-up on 2001-10-22',

example.p: that indicates the operation activity contained a start-up activity, is a composition_of_individual_activity.

li.p: a relationship between one individual activity and another that indicates one is part of the other.

li.note: Class of composition of activity is within the scope of the Class_of_composition_of_activity application module.

li.p: classification of a whole-part relationship between activities.
li.note: Classification of composition of activity is within the scope of the Activity_structure_and_classification application module.

uof.name: Composition_of_individual_activity
uof.description: The Composition_of_individual_activity UoF identifies a composition of individual activity and defines the individual activities for the whole and part.
